channel.name: Type
channel.comment: Type of the output signal: SINE, TRIANGLE, etc.

channel.name: Output
channel.comment: Single Y value of the output

channel.name: PairOutput
channel.comment: Single (time, value) pair of the signal

channel.name: History
channel.comment: Last 10 Y values of the signal

channel.name: PairHistory
channel.comment: Last 10 (time, value) pairs of the signal

channel.name: Info
channel.comment: Composite field of signal information, containing histories, pairs etc
